backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor serving as a placeholder backend entry point.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting two features related to fixing blank page issues and ensuring asset loading, both linked to frontend/index.html with high confidence.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file containing JSON-formatted summaries of all frontend component files, describing their styling (glassmorphism, Font Awesome icons), functionality, and design patterns.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS configuration with OKLCH color system variables for light and dark themes, including custom CSS properties for borders, backgrounds, and component styling.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point with SEO meta tags, structured JSON-LD data for local business, Google Fonts for multilingual support (Gujarati/Hindi), and noscript fallback.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component that renders the LandingPage component.
frontend/src/components/landing/BookingS: Booking form component with name, service type, and area inputs that submits data via WhatsApp link, featuring glass-panel styling and a custom green button with shine animation.
frontend/src/components/landing/Coverage: Coverage information section with Font Awesome icons, glass-panel styling, and SEO-focused text describing service areas.
frontend/src/components/landing/Floating: Fixed-position floating WhatsApp button with pill-shaped styling, accessibility attributes, and translated labels.
frontend/src/components/landing/HeroSect: Hero section component with animated background image, multi-layer gradient overlays, floating decorative blobs, and glass-styled content panel containing title, tagline, and CTA buttons for WhatsApp and phone contact.
frontend/src/components/landing/IconBadg: Reusable icon badge component with configurable size, variant (primary/orange), and optional sound effects on click, featuring gradient backgrounds and hover animations.
frontend/src/components/landing/LandingF: Footer component displaying brand logo, service van icon, CTA buttons for phone and WhatsApp, copyright notice, and attribution link to caffeine.ai with UTM tracking.
frontend/src/components/landing/LandingN: Sticky navigation bar with brand logo, language selector (English/Hindi/Gujarati), and 'Book Now' button that smoothly scrolls to the booking section.
frontend/src/components/landing/LandingP: Main landing page component that assembles all sections including navigation, hero, services, coverage, booking, footer, and floating WhatsApp button into a complete page layout.
frontend/src/components/landing/LocalSeo: SEO-focused section displaying four local service phrases in a grid layout with icons, plus a footer text block for additional local search optimization.
frontend/src/components/landing/OurWorkS: Portfolio gallery section displaying six work images in a responsive grid with hover effects, showcasing AC cleaning services, before/after shots, and service team photos.
frontend/src/components/landing/Services: Services overview section presenting four core services (water jet, water jet foam, repairing, installation) in a responsive grid with icons and descriptions.
frontend/src/components/landing/SofaClea: Dedicated section for sofa and upholstery cleaning services, featuring service list, pricing, four feature highlights with orange-themed icons, and promotional discount text.
frontend/src/components/landing/WaterJet: Two-column section highlighting water jet foam service with product image, detailed description, four benefit cards (deep cleaning, protection, eco-friendly, efficiency), and CTA button.
frontend/src/components/ServiceAreasSect: Service areas section displaying coverage locations in a grid layout with Font Awesome map marker icons and glassmorphism card styling.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook that manages an authenticated or anonymous actor for backend communication using Internet Identity, with automatic query invalidation when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useIconSound.ts: React hook that manages icon click sound effects with volume control, localStorage persistence for user preference, and graceful error handling for audio playback.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: React context provider and hook for Internet Identity authentication, managing login state, identity persistence, and delegation validation with configurable AuthClient options.
frontend/src/i18n/LanguageProvider.tsx: React context provider for multi-language support (English, Hindi, Gujarati) with localStorage persistence and document language attribute updates.
frontend/src/i18n/translations.ts: TypeScript definitions and translation objects for three languages (en, hi, gu) covering all UI sections including navigation, hero, services, booking, and footer content.
frontend/src/i18n/useTranslation.ts: Simple hook wrapper that exposes the language context for accessing translations and language switching functionality.
frontend/src/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS configuration with custom CSS variables for light/dark themes, glassmorphism effects, brand colors (teal/cyan water jet theme), and animation utilities with reduced-motion support.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up React Query, Internet Identity provider, and renders the root App component.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom theme extensions for multi-language fonts (Gujarati, Devanagari), OKLCH color system, glassmorphism shadows, and custom animations for hero and UI elements.
project_state.json: Project metadata tracking the Water Jet Service website's features, known issues (blank page bug), architectural notes about multi-language support and SEO optimization for Ahmedabad locations.
